Package controller

Class AdminCreateEditAppointmentScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.AdminCreateEditAppointmentScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AdminCreateEditAppointmentScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the AdminCreateEditAppointmentScreenController.fxml document and is not meant to be instantiated. The class will either load the form with Appointment data passed from the previous screen or will begin as blank text fields and combo boxes for the User to enter the Appointment data into.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes all form fields to either correspond with the appointment passed from the previous screen or sets them to a blank state to represent a new appointment.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle - An unreferenced ResourceBundle object passed automatically.
      url - An unreferenced URL object passed automatically.

    • toAllAppointmentsScreen

      public void toAllAppointmentsScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the Back button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the AllAppointmentsScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Back button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • onSubmit

      public void onSubmit(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      This method is an event handler for the Submit button that saves the entered Appointment data to the database and redirects the application back to the allAppointmentScreen. The method gathers the data from the form, executes the SQL to update the database and then loads the FXML document for the allAppointmentScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Submit button.
      Throws:
      IOException - The FXMLLoader.load() call will throw this exception if the FXML document can't be found.
      SQLException - This execution will be thrown if the SQL does not execute properly.

    • onStartTime

      public void onStartTime(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method changes the available end time options to only show times occurring after the start time that was selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - ActionEvent object passed from the event listener on the date picker.

    • setEndTimes

      public void setEndTimes()
      This method loads the endTimeComboBox with potential end times, based on the start time that was passed from the selected Appointment.

    • onStateSelect

      public void onStateSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is an event handler on the StateComboBox. When a state is initially chosen, it sets the corresponding Region and fills the salespersonComboBox and customerComboBox with the salespersons and customers for that region. It also filters out the remaining states so that only states from that region are available. To get the full list of states back, the region needs to be changed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the StateComboBox.

    • onRegionSelect

      public void onRegionSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is an event handler on the RegionComboBox. When the region is changed, it resets the StateComboBox with the states belonging to that region and fills the salespersonComboBox and customerComboBox with the salespersons and customers for that region. The only way to change the stateComboBox and customerComboBox items after that is to select a different Region.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the RegionComboBox.

    • setTempAppointment

      public static void setTempAppointment(Appointment paramAppointment)
      Static method that allows the previous screen to pass an Appointment object to be edited.
      Parameters:
      paramAppointment - Appointment object passed from the allAppointmentsScreen.

    • resetRegionBasedInfo

      public void resetRegionBasedInfo(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method resets the region based combo boxes back to the original state of the screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Reset button.

    • toAdminCreateClientScreen

      public void toAdminCreateClientScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException

      Parameters:

      Parameters:
